name: Overclocked (itch) (Bread)
description:
A physics based puzzle platformer game about manipulating a clocktower's time.

Made for Godot Wild Jam #37

You can view the source code here

Credits

Programming - Bread

Art - Mr. Solo

Music/SFX - erhan.jpg

HTML5 Warning

The browser version will run poorly compared to the native versions. If you are able, consider installing a version for your operating system instead.

For Mac users

You may need to run this command for the game to open.

    xattr -cr /path/to/application.app
